hero.title: Convert Bank Statements to MT940 Instantly
hero.subtitle: Seamlessly convert your bank statements from CSV, PDF, or Excel (XLS/XLSX) format to the standard MT940 format. Our AI-powered tool automatically detects transactions and simplifies your financial data processing.
hero.dragDrop: Drag and drop your files here

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Our platform is designed to make your financial data management as simple and efficient as possible.

multiFormat.title: AI-Powered Multi-Format Support
multiFormat.description: Convert CSV, PDF, and Excel (XLS/XLSX) bank statements effortlessly using advanced AI technology.

secure.title: Secure & Private

seo.title: CSV2MT - Convert Bank Statements to MT940 Format Instantly
